name: coffeekraken-html-boilerplate
description: Base HTML files and folder structure with complete build process (js, sass, image compression, etc...) built in

scripts.dist: npm run dist.icons && npm run dist.css && npm run dist.js && npm run dist.img && npm run dist.fonts
scripts.dist.js: webpack && env TITLE='dist.js' MESSAGE='Complete' ICON='icon-js' npm run notify
scripts.dist.css: node-sass src/sass/style.scss dist/css/style.css  --include-path node_modules --output-style expanded && env TITLE='dist.css' MESSAGE='Complete' ICON='icon-css' npm run notify
scripts.dist.img: rm -rf dist/img && node ./.scripts/imagemin.js && env TITLE='dist.img' MESSAGE='Complete' ICON='icon-img' npm run notify
scripts.dist.fonts: rm -rf dist/fonts && cp -R src/fonts dist/fonts && env TITLE='dist.fonts' MESSAGE='Complete' ICON='icon-fonts' npm run notify
scripts.dist.fonticon: gulp icons && env TITLE='dist.icons' MESSAGE='Complete' ICON='icon-icons' npm run notify
scripts.dist.prod: npm run dist.prod.css && npm run dist.prod.js && npm run dist.img && npm run dist.fonts
scripts.dist.prod.js: webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js && env TITLE='dist.prod.js' MESSAGE='Complete' ICON='icon-js' npm run notify
scripts.dist.prod.css: node-sass src/sass/style.scss dist/css/style.css --include-path node_modules --output-style compressed && env TITLE='dist.prod.css' MESSAGE='Complete' ICON='icon-css' npm run notify
scripts.notify: if which terminal-notifier; then terminal-notifier -title $TITLE -message $MESSAGE -appIcon ".resources/$ICON.png" -timeout 5; fi;
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch" "npm run server" "npm run livereload"

author: Coffeekraken <hello@coffeekraken.io>
